Learn

All Classes

Join the classes we have online together! We are learning Norwegian from A1-B2 level with creative PPTs. We go through important grammar and vocabulary with fun materials and intriguing lessons. This is for anyone who want to talk with each other and have fun with the learning.

The teacher

How is the teacher?

Torleif

Torleif is a driven teacher. He started teaching in 2018 after attaining his TEFL certificate in Madrid. Since starting he's had more than 100 students and +1000 classes. His teaching method is a communicative approach to make the students talking, with fun and dynamic materials the lessons are very exciting!

If you are looking for a long term solution for reaching fluency then Torleif is an ideal teacher for you. Just send him a message any time and he will help you out.
Vi snakkes senere!

Reviews

How are the classes?

Michael

"Torleif is a great Norwegian teacher and I feel my level has improved significantly in a short time. His lessons are very well organised and easy to follow. He is patient and explains things carefully giving useful feedback and advice. After each class I receive a summary of the lesson plus practice homework."

Robin

"I've had around 30 Norwegian lessons with Torleif and each has been engaging, well-planned and tailored to my level. He explains concepts clearly, and his slides for each lesson are really engaging which helps me remember the vocabulary and grammar. I can now have conversations with Norwegians in their native language, and most of that is thanks to Torleif's great teaching."

Tim

"Torleif's teaching methods are highly effective and relevant. The way he approaches his language lessons is to allow the student to explore how the Norwegian language works, but at the same time provide support when the student struggles. This is demonstrated through his interactive slides, which are designed through a storyboard that is simple to follow and comprehensive at the same time. I've had almost 50 lessons with Torleif, and I must say every lesson has been an amazing learning experience for me. Can't wait till we hit 100. "

Norwegian Language

Join single classes where you can practice conversations and grammar. It's a one-on-one session with either 30, 45 or 60-min classes. Click below and schedule a time that suits best to your timetable. Vi snakkes!
